downloadTitle: Performance Best Practices in Mainframe Migration to .NET & SQL Server
downloadDescription: Performance Best Practices in Mainframe Migration to .NET & SQL Server

downloadFile.name: Performance Best Practices in Mainframe Migration to .NET and SQL Server.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/7/5/c752e818-a83c-4e8f-91ec-c03bbe4de86a/Performance Best Practices in Mainframe Migration to .NET and SQL Server.pdf

detailsSection:
This document describes some general performance recommendations, several query batching 
strategies with their pros and cons, as well as a list of helpful performance turning resources.
detailsSection_file_name: Performance Best Practices in Mainframe Migration to .NET and SQL Server.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains the whitepaper.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
